addOnDescription.message: PassSec+ alerts the user to enter passwords on websites where they could be compromised.
addOnDescription.description: Short description of the add-on's functionality

urlInfoText.message: You are visiting the website using the following URL:

formURLInfoTextData.message: The data entered would be sent to the website with the following URL:

formURLInfoTextPassword.message: The password would be sent to the website with the following URL:

verifyDomain.message: Verify this information before you enter data here.

verbleibendeZeit.description: Remaining time until field is activated.

appearanceSecure.message: Appearance, if the input is secure:

appearanceNotSecure.message: Appearance, if the input is NOT secure:
appearanceNotSecure.description: Title for appearance if not secure

changeIconText.message: You can change the icon for secure input here:

iconHint.message: Note: If there were only one icon, fraudulent websites could fool you into thinking that it is safe to enter a password or other sensitive data, because the website itself would display the field with a green border and add the appropriate icon.

addRedirectionList.message: It is possible to add some redirects recommended by SECUSO. More information and a list of redirects can be found on https://www.secuso.org/passsec.

httpsRedirects.message: List of domains that are automatically redirected from http to https (secure mode)

deleteEntryWarning.message: Are you sure you want to delete the list entry  '$ENTRY$' ?
deleteEntryWarning.description: Warn user before deleting a list entry

deleteAllEntriesWarning.message: Are you sure you want to delete all entries in the list?
deleteAllEntriesWarning.description: Warn user before deleting all list entries

userTrustedList.message: List of domains you classify as 'low risk'.

userExceptionList.message: List of domains you classify as 'low risk'.

lowRiskDomains.message: List of domains considered 'low risk' by developers (green frame).
lowRiskDomains.description: Activate timer on list of trusted domains.

activateLowRiskList.message: Activate list of domains the developers consider as 'low-risk'

userTrustedDomains.message: List of domains that you have classified as 'low risk' (blue frame).
userTrustedDomains.description: List of user risk domains (websites with https).

userExceptions.message: List of special cases where PassSec+ has detected an anomaly but you have decided that there is a low risk (red background)
userExceptions.description: List of user risk domains (websites with http).

userList.message: List of domains you classify as 'low risk'.

editUserList.description: Show and edit list of user risk domains.

checkExceptions20Starts.message: Check exceptions automatically after 20 browser starts.

checkExceptions20StartsTooltip.message: This check is used to keep the list of exceptions up to date.
checkExceptions20StartsTooltip.description: Tooltip for Check website exceptions after 20 starts

fieldTypes.message: Types of fields, which are taken into consideration

paymentFieldDescription.message: Fields with payment information (E.g. credit card numbers)

personalFieldDescription.message: Fields with further personal data (E.g. e-mail addresses)

notesOnFields.message: Note: PassSec+ makes every effort to identify and then mark the appropriate fields. Unfortunately, this is not always possible. If you notice on a web page that a field was not recognized, you are welcome to send us this web page and we will try to further develop PassSec+ accordingly.
notesOnFields.description: Text for notes on the fields

brokenHTTPS.message: Classify BROKEN HTTPS connection as safe

brokenHTTPSDescription.message: BROKEN-HTTPS means that the website is encrypted with HTTPS, but also contains elements that are not encrypted and are therefore blocked by default by the browser.

defaultSettingsWarning.message: Do you really want to restore the default settings? All stored redirects and exceptions are going to be deleted!
defaultSettingsWarning.description: Warn user before restoring default settings

savedChanges.message: Changes saved! Please reload the page on which you are using PassSec+.

defaultSettingsRestored.message: Default settings restored! Please reload the page on which you are using PassSec+.

confirmAddingHttpExceptionTitle.message: Do you really want to add an exception?
confirmAddingHttpExceptionTitle.description: Title for adding exception on http site

confirmAddingHttpException.message:
If you add this exception, then you will no longer be warned when you visit websites from
$SITEDOMAIN$
with
$SITEPROTOCOL$
and if the website is configured so that data you enter is sent with
$FORMPROTOCOL$
to a website from
$FORMDOMAIN$
confirmAddingHttpException.description: Warn user before adding exception on http site

confirmAddingHttpsException.message:
Do you want to add an exception for the website
$URL$
?
confirmAddingHttpsException.description: Warn user before adding exception on https site

confirmExceptionButton.message: Yes, I know what I am doing!

buttonDeactivationAddingHttpException.message: The left button has been disabled so you can consider if you want to add the exception.
buttonDeactivationAddingHttpException.description: Disabling the button for adding the exception.

riskText111Data.message:
Unknown risk:
The risk of entering your password in this field cannot be determined. You have to judge the risk yourself.

riskRecommendation111Data.message: Check the domain (bold characters of the URL above).

moreRecommendation111Data.message: Check the domain (bold characters of the URL above).

moreInfo111Data.message: The domain (bold characters) of the URL and, thus, its trustworthiness are unknown to PassSec+. The domain is not amongst the most frequently visited domains in Germany. You did not identified URLs with this domain as trustworthy in the past. [less]
moreInfo111Data.description: Info text if the domain is unknown but the website uses https.

inputDelayText111Data.message: The input has been disabled to give you time to check the domain.
inputDelayText111Data.description: Text for Deactivation of the link

riskText111Password.message:
Unknown risk:
The risk for entering your password in this field cannot be determined. You have to classify the risk yourself.

riskRecommendation111Password.message: Check the domain (bold characters of the URL above).

moreRecommendation111Password.message: Check the domain (bold characters of the URL above).

moreInfo111Password.message: The domain (bold characters) of the URL and, thus, its trustworthiness are unknown to PassSec+. The domain is not amongst the most frequently visited domains in Germany. You did not identified URLs with this domain as trustworthy in the past. [less]
moreInfo111Password.description: Info text if the domain is unknown but the website uses https.

inputDelayText111Password.message: The password entry has been disabled to give you time to check the domain.
inputDelayText111Password.description: Text for Deactivation of the link

riskTooltipSummaryHttpOnlyData.message: There is no secure connection to the website.

riskTextHttpOnlyData.message:
High risk:
The risk of entering sensitive data is classified as high. The website can be accessed only via 'HTTP'. 'HTTP' does not establish a secure connection.

riskRecommendationHttpOnlyData.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. [more]

moreRecommendationHttpOnlyData.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. If unavoidable, contact the website operator and ask to enable 'HTTPS'. [less]
moreRecommendationHttpOnlyData.description: More recommendations info to use https

moreInfoHttpOnlyData.message: This website is accessed over an insecure connection ('HTTP'), so there is no way to ensure that the web page actually originates from the domain of the URL actually requested. It is not possible to access this website using 'HTTPS'. It is therefore impossible to protect your data entered here from possible interception by unauthorized persons.
moreInfoHttpOnlyData.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummaryHttpOnlyPassword.message: There is no secure connection to the website.

riskTextHttpOnlyPassWord.message:
High risk:
The risk of entering your password is classified as high. The website can be accessed only via 'HTTP'. 'HTTP' does not establish a secure connection.

riskRecommendationHttpOnlyPassword.message: Do not enter your password here. [more]

moreRecommendationHttpOnlyPassword.message: Do not enter your password here. If unavoidable, contact the website operator and ask to enable 'HTTPS'. [less]
moreRecommendationHttpOnlyPassword.description: More recommendations info to use https

moreInfoHttpOnlyPassword.message: This website is accessed over an insecure connection ('HTTP'), so there is no way to ensure that the web page actually originates from the domain of the URL actually requested. It is not possible to access this website using 'HTTPS'. It is therefore impossible to protect your password from possible interception by unauthorized persons. If you still decide to enter your password, make sure that the password is unique and not shared with other services. Otherwise, if the password is collected by an unauthorized person, they can use it to access every service for which you may use this password.
moreInfoHttpOnlyPassword.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummaryHttpsAvailableData.message: There is no secure connection to the website.

riskTextHttpsAvailableData.message:
High risk:
The risk of entering sensitive data is classified as high. The website was accessed via 'HTTP'. 'HTTP' does not establish a secure connection.

riskRecommendationHttpsAvailableData.message: Switch to the 'https' version, of this website. [more]

moreRecommendationHttpsAvailableData.message: The website offers an https connection. It is recommended to switch to that one. To always access this website over an https connection, click on 'Switch to HTTPS'. [less]
moreRecommendationHttpsAvailableData.description: More recommendations info to use https

moreInfoHttpsAvailableData.message: This website is accessed over an insecure connection ('HTTP'), so there is no way to ensure that the web page actually originates from the domain of the URL actually requested. Using 'HTTPS' allows to contact the website over a secure connection. Connecting using 'HTTPS' is one of the three conditions to securely enter your data. The other two are to check that the website is the legitimate one, and not a copy, and that the data you enter is sent to a server with the same domain. The data fields are red if any of these conditions are not met. [less]
moreInfoHttpsAvailableData.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummaryHttpsAvailablePassword.message: There is no secure connection to the website.

riskTextHttpsAvailablePassword.message:
High risk:
The risk of entering your password is classified as high. The website was accessed via 'HTTP'. 'HTTP' does not establish a secure connection.

riskRecommendationHttpsAvailablePassword.message: Switch to the 'https' version, of this website. [more]

moreRecommendationHttpsAvailablePassword.message: The website offers an https connection. It is recommended to switch to that one. To always access this website over an https connection, click on 'Switch to HTTPS'. [less]
moreRecommendationHttpsAvailablePassword.description: More recommendations info to use https

moreInfoHttpsAvailablePassword.message: This website is accessed over an insecure connection ('HTTP'), so there is no way to ensure that the web page actually originates from the domain of the URL actually requested. Using 'HTTPS' allows to contact the website over a secure connection. Connecting using 'HTTPS' is one of the three conditions to securely enter your data. The other two are to check that the website is the legitimate one, and not a copy, and that the password you enter is sent to a server with the same domain. The data fields are red if any of these conditions are not met. [less]
moreInfoHttpsAvailablePassword.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummary110Data.message: Your entered data would be sent to another website.

riskText110Data.message:
High risk:
The risk of entering sensitive data is classified as high. The website will send your data to a server with another domain.

riskRecommendation110Data.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. [more]

moreRecommendation110Data.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. If unavoidable, contact the website operator and ask them to check the configuration of this website. [less]

moreInfo110Data.message: This website will send the sensitive data you enter to a server with another domain.

riskTooltipSummary110Password.message: The password would be sent to another website.

riskText110Password.message:
High risk:
The risk of entering your password is classified as high. The website will send your password to a server with another domain.

riskRecommendation110Password.message: Do not enter your password here. [more]

moreRecommendation110Password.message: Do not enter your password here. If unavoidable, contact the website operator and ask them to check the configuration of this website. [less]

moreInfo110Password.message: This website will send the password you enter to a server with another domain. If you still decide to enter your password, make sure that the password is unique and not shared with other services. [less]
moreInfo110Password.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummary101Data.message: Your entered data would be sent over an insecure connection.

riskText101Data.message:
High risk:
The risk of entering sensitive data is classified as high because the website does not send the entered data to the server through a secure connection.

riskRecommendation101Data.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. [more]

moreRecommendation101Data.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. If unavoidable, contact the website operator and ask to enable 'HTTPS'. [less]

moreInfo101Data.message: The website sends your data via 'HTTP' instead of 'HTTPS'. It is therefore impossible to protect your data entered here from possible interception by unauthorized persons. [less]
moreInfo101Data.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummary101Password.message: The password would be sent over an insecure connection.

riskText101Password.message:
High risk:
The risk of entering your password is classified as high because the website does not send the entered password to the server through a secure connection.

riskRecommendation101Password.message: Do not enter your password here. [more]

moreRecommendation101Password.message: Do not enter your password here. If unavoidable, contact the website operator and ask to enable 'HTTPS'. [less]

moreInfo101Password.message: This website sends the password via 'HTTP' instead of 'HTTPS'. It is therefore impossible to protect your password from possible interception by unauthorized persons. If you still decide to enter your password, make sure that the password is unique and not shared with other services. Otherwise, if the password is collected by an unauthorized person, they can use it to access every service for which you may use this password. [less]
moreInfo101Password.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummary100Data.message: Your entered data would be sent to another website over an insecure connection.

riskText100Data.message:
High risk:
The risk of entering sensitive data is classified as high. The website will send the entered data to a server with another domain over an insecure connection.

riskRecommendation100Data.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. [more]

moreRecommendation100Data.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. If unavoidable, contact the website operator and ask them to check the configuration of this website. [less]

moreInfo100Data.message: This website sends the data via 'HTTP' instead of 'HTTPS' to a server with another domain. It is therefore impossible to protect your data from possible interception by unauthorized persons. [less]
moreInfo100Data.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummary100Password.message: The password would be sent to another website over an insecure connection.

riskText100Password.message:
High risk:
The risk of entering your password is classified as high. The website will send your password to a server with another domain over an insecure connection.

riskRecommendation100Password.message: Do not enter your password here. [more]

moreRecommendation100Password.message: Do not enter your password here. If unavoidable, contact the website operator and ask them to check the configuration of this website. [less]

moreInfo100Password.message: This website sends the password via 'HTTP' instead of 'HTTPS' to a server with another domain. It is therefore impossible to protect your password from possible interception by unauthorized persons. If you still decide to enter your password, make sure that the password is unique and not shared with other services. Otherwise, if the password is collected by an unauthorised person, they can use it to access every other service using it. [less]
moreInfo100Password.description: Info https: user enters login data.

inputDelayTextData.message: The input has been disabled so that you can consider how to continue.

inputDelayTextPassword.message: The password entry has been disabled so that you can consider how to continue.
